oai_dc:dc.dc:description: k g ra and !haunu, who fought each other with lightning. By /han kass o (L VIII.

8648). kagara (a bird who was formerly a man) goes to !haunu (who is a rain's person) to take back his younger sister (!haunu's wife) and return her to her parents. There follows a fight (with lightning and thunder) and blood issuing from the nostrils of !haunu.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: kagara and !haunu
